thread.title: Greece's Tsipras to meet Merkel, Hollande, Tusk on summit sidelines
thread.title_full: Greece's Tsipras to meet Merkel, Hollande, Tusk on summit sidelines | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Greece's Tsipras to meet Merkel, Hollande, Tusk on summit sidelines
text:
ATHENS, July 12 Greek Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras will meet German Chancellor Angela Merkel, French President Francois Hollande and European Council President Donald Tusk on the sidelines of a summit of euro zone leaders in Brussels, a Greek government official said on Sunday.
Greece is racing to convince its international creditors that it will deliver tough reforms- which include tax hikes, pension cuts and privatisations- in order to secure a cash-for-reforms deal and remain in the euro zone. (Reporting by Renee Maltezou, writing by Costas Pitas)
